Posts.Content: stayingstrong wrote: I have been on Adriamycin for 3 cycles 21 days apart - CT showed some change in liver growths, no change in lymph nodes.  Then placed on Adriamycin, 5FU  - second dose of 5FU one week later - one week break, repeat the Adriamycin, 5FU one more cycle - I am scheduled for CT Scan tomorrow; but, the last several days I am so short of breath and my heart is racing when I try to walk as little as ten feet to bathroom - return to bed and have to sit on the side for ten - fifteen minutes before my heart and breathing let me get back in bed.  Needless to say, I am very worried about getting through the CT Scan and waiting to see MD on June 1.  Anyone have these experiences and any advice would be appreciated.  I usually stay in the background because there are so many more knowledgable and strong supporters; but, I do keep you all in my daily prayers and thoughts.  Log in to post a reply
